description.fr:
{%FightStarted}
Invoque le monstre {#ELITE} {Summoning:69} dans l'équipe adverse.
\---
{value:pc,percent,+} à la {%pvmax} et {value:percent1,percent,+} à l'{%AT} des {%Family_Vampyre_Name,plural:other}.
\---
<rem>Valable uniquement sur le {WorldZone:27}.</rem>
description.en:
{%FightStarted}
Summons the {#ELITE} monster {Summoning:69} on the opposing team.
\---
{value:pc,percent,+} to {%Family_Vampyre_Name,plural:other}' {%pvmax} and {value:percent1,percent,+} to their {%AT}.
\---
<rem>Valid only on the {WorldZone:27}.</rem>
description.es:
{%FightStarted}
Invoca al monstruo {#ELITE}{Summoning:69} en el equipo enemigo.
\---
{value:pc,percent,+} a la {%pvmax} y {value:percent1,percent,+} al {%AT} de los {%Family_Vampyre_Name,plural:other}.
\---
<rem>Válido únicamente en el{WorldZone:27}.</rem>
description.de:
{%FightStarted}
Beschwört das {#ELITE}-Monster {Summoning:69} im gegnerischen Team.
\---
{value:pc,percent,+} auf die {%pvmax} und {value:percent1,percent,+} auf den {%AT} der {%Family_Vampyre_Name,plural:other}.
\---
<rem>Gilt nur auf dem {WorldZone:27}.</rem>
description.pt:
{%FightStarted}
Invoca o monstro {#ELITE} {Summoning:69} na equipe adversária.
\---
{value:pc,percent,+} à {%pvmax} e {value:percent1,percent,+} ao {%AT} dos {%Family_Vampyre_Name,plural:other}.
\---
<rem>Válido apenas no {WorldZone:27}.</rem>
